mapper.select: with b as ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(#{productDate}, 'MM') + LEVEL - 1,'yy-MM-dd') AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= LAST_DAY(#{productDate})- TRUNC(#{productDate}, 'MM') + 1 ) , a as ( SELECT TO_CHAR(product_date, 'yy-MM-dd') AS dt ,amountcon ,operation FROM store_Material_consumption WHERE product_date BETWEEN TRUNC(#{productDate}, 'MM') AND LAST_DAY(#{productDate}) AND store_NUMBEr = #{storeNumber} AND material_number = #{materialNumber} ) SELECT b.dt , a.amountcon , a.operation FROM a full outer join b on a.dt = b.dt ORDER BY b.dt
